TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NAIndicatorTransform extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.OneToOneTransformBase
Public NotInheritable Class NAIndicatorTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformBase

Docs.summary: This transform can transform either scalars or vectors (both fixed and variable size), creating output columns that indicate corresponding NA values.

member.name: NAIndicator
member.summary: This transform can transform either scalars or vectors (both fixed and variable size), creating output columns that indicate, through the true/false booleans whether the row has a missing value.
